name: Complete Control (JackBarlow)
description:
(Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020)

You recently came across an old arcade cabinet of your favorite game from when you were a kid. Unfortunately, it's in pretty rough shape and keeps glitching out, changing the control scheme mid-game, so you can only use part of your move-set at any given time. Try to last as long as possible and post your highscore in the comments!

(Glitch and spark textures from textures4photoshop.com)

(Arcade cabinet border from fineartamerica.com)

(Sound effects from freesound.com)

(Music from melodyloops.com)
